price: Ibyo ni ukubera ko bakunze ubuzima bw’isi bakaburutisha ubw’imperuka. Kandi mu by’ukuri Allah ntayobora abantu b’abahakanyi.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱسۡتَحَبُّواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu is'taḥabbū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna
